query: <s> what did marketing think of potential cost pressure incurred by the application of battery status display ?
answer: marketing : yeah , one other little thing . thought it might be handy to put a battery status display on it . project manager : that 's a marketing : so you can see project manager : battery stays . user interface : okay , yeah . marketing : how much is left in the battery . but they 'll also really drag up the production costs , so think we 'll have to see about that too . project manager : yeah .
